name: Mech Engineer
description:
The gameplay is focused on resource management and mech assembly. You will not be able to control the Mechs in battle.


  • First. Assemble the heart of the Mech – reactor. Increase its power with components, while keeping temperature down.
  • Terrain's temperature affects on reactors to the point that, it can shut down them.



  • Second. Then prepare your weapon. Customize rate of fire, weight, energy consumption, accuracy and firepower.
  • Different enemies require specific weapons. Rate of fire also changes the speed of spending ammunition.



  • Third. When assembling mechs, the main thing to remember about limiting weight and available energy.
  • The types of mechs differ from each other also in their adaptability to different terrain.



  • Fourth. Sending mechs into battle will provide resources and open up new terrain for completing a global mission.
  • It is important to control the route on the global map and track the probability of enemy bases on the cells.


  • Good luck!
